extendedInfo.description: Feel the magic with a lot of âfantasy wallpapersâ! Wonderful colors that fantasy world hides will spread all over your screen!  Choose your own imaginary background and feel free to replace it with another one whenever you want! A magic stick is finally in your hands! Cast a spell on your screen! - Easy-to-browse interface enables you to find the desired wallpaper in no time!- Customize the wallpaper to fit your taste and screen!- Zoom, un-zoom, rotate, move, scale, adjust brightness, add various effects and save your background design!Fantasy is as complex as it is broad. This genre refers to the events that occur outside the ordinary laws that operate within the universe. Magic is also central to this genre as well as stories that often involve journeys and quests.You might think of this as a genre populated with elves, dwarves, magic, and dark lords, but this is only one small aspect of it. There are many types of this genre, each a unique piece of the puzzle but most of them are included in the Fantasy Wallpapers. Epic fantasy usually includes a life or death struggle between good and evil, a large cast of characters, and multiple books. Most modern books of this kind are considered the epic.Some of the more recent popular books include Jordan's The Wheel of Time, Martin's A Game of Thrones , and Brandon Sanderson's Mistborn . This epic aspect has been around for decades in the form of Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings. If you go through the whole range of wallpapers you will maybe come up to your favorite movie character of this genre. Heroic fantasy always focuses on the development of a hero and usually involves a quest of some sort. Strong elements of good and evil are often present.High fantasy usually includes a well drawn world where magic follows a specific set of rules.On the other hand fables tend to focus on imparting some sort of moral wisdom to the protagonist the end of the tale. A Fable is often approached from the perspective of a child or youth. Currently, some writers are modernizing fables for the modern adult reader.
